content.description:
Start low on two opposing sidepulls. Set a left heel, and do a huge crossover to reach a good left hand. Bust up and right to the seam, and get your feet set up. Dyno to the next seam (avoiding the plant), then use a good hold pull yourself the top.

Great movement!
content.location: It is on the main face of Miles' Cliff. The starting holds are more so on the left side, and the route works its way up and right to the middle of the wall.

content.description:
Start as you would for

Giant Steps

on the far right of the boulder, moving left at the top using a good, right-hand sidepull which allows you to reach into the crack.
content.location: Start on a huge jug on the far right of the wall.

content.description: Start on the far right of the face on a jug low to the ground. Set your feet up, and bust high and left to another jug, then go up and right to the finish. This is short and sweet.
content.location: It is on the right 'arete' of Miles' Cliff.

content.description:
Start just left of the beginning of '

Slap the Bass

'. Sit start, then reach up for a good hold, match it, then reach up and left again to a seam. Throw a right hand into the crack, get a high right foot, then reach up high to a jug.
content.location:
Start sitting down with your right hand on a sidepull directly between the start holds for '

Slap the Bass

' and your left hand on a better sidepull. This is just to the left of '

Slap the Bass

'.
